title: CBC Comedy
text:
Each week, we're selecting our favourite moments from CBC Comedy's sketch comedy lineup: Baroness von Sketch Show, TallBoyz and This Hour Has 22 Minutes.

This week, we double up on sketches! From 22 Minutes, Andrew Scheer is caught in a scandal and there is a new app for politicians called Spinnerly; a Baroness is in perimenopause (or is she?); and a TallBoy wants to increase his withdrawal limit at the bank. Plus, a bonus sketch from last week of botoxed Baronesses catching up and exchanging compliments.

What was your favourite sketch? Tweet us at @CBCTelevision or @CBCComedy and use the hashtag #cbcsketchcomedy.
description: Each week, we bring you some of the best moments from CBC Comedy's sketch comedy lineup. You can stream full episodes on CBC Gem.
